title: ThunderCats, Vol. 1: Reclaiming Thundera
description: The Thundercats are a group of feline warriors battling to save their homeworld. This brand new story picks up where the 80s television series left off and with art by red hot creator Ed McGuinness (Superman), J Scott Campbell (Danger Girl) and Francisco Herrera...the Thundercats are back! Lion-O, Panthro, Tygra, Cheetara and the Thunderkittens seek to rebuild a new life for themselves on New Thundera but there are ominous stirrings at Mumm-Ra's pyramid. The ancient spirits of evil seek to unleash the Shadowmaster from the Shadow Realm and it might just spell doom for our heroes! This is the first volume in a new Titan series.
author: Ford Lytle Gilmore
